menu.title: Menu 'Fintess'
menu.descr: The Fitness menu is a new approach to preparing dishes more fresh vegetables and fruits. A product for active and healthy people. It's a completely new product with an optimal price and high quality

menu.title: 'Lenten' menu
menu.descr: The 'Lenten' menu is a careful selection of ingredients: completely no animal products, milk made from almonds, oats, coconut, or buckwheat, and the right amount of protein thanks to tofu and imported vegetarian steaks.

menu.title: Menu 'Premium'
menu.descr: In the 'Premium' menu, we use not only beautiful packaging design but also high-quality dish preparation. Red fish, seafood, fruits â€” a restaurant-level menu without going to the restaurant!
